page.title: 25Cars
page.content:
Several large garages have sprung up in the area with Peugeot, Toyota, Renault, Honda, Skoda dealerships.

Best selling cars in 2010 were Ford Fiesta, Vauxhall Astra, Ford Focus, Vauxhall Corsa, VW Golf, VW Polo, Peugeot 207, BMW Series 3. Mini, Nissan Qashquai.

Hybrid cars are being manufactured to help cut down on greenhouse gases.

Petrol has hit an all time high at £1.35 per litre in this area.

Generally cars are far more reliable than they ever were in 1986. Bodywork is virtually rust-free and engines are all tested by computers. Any faults are highlighted by computerised systems both internally and by qualified engineers. Road tax in 2011 is £155 for a diesel engine, but this varies according to the CO2 emissions. Some cars can be virtually tax free.

Most households own at least one car.




Yvonne
